summary: 3D project with crystal glass visualization featuring AgX tone mapping, selective bloom on Layer 1, physical intensities, and biome configurations. Currently calibrating bloom and emissive settings for subtle professional glow.
architectural_notes: Bloom settings (CubeVisualisation.tsx): intensity=0.15, radius=0.5, luminanceThreshold=0.1; do not touch smoothing or other post-processing passes
LandModel.tsx biomeConfigs: emissiveIntensity=1.0 for all biomes, pulse=0.15; metalness/roughness and geometry logic must not be changed

existing_features.title: In CubeVisualization.tsx, update only the following numeric values in the Bloom post-processing pass: set intensity to 0.15, set radius to 0.5, set luminanceThreshold to 0.1. Do NOT modify smoothing, any other Bloom properties, any other post-processing passes, or any other logic or structure in the file.

In LandModel.tsx, within the biomeConfigs block, change emissiveIntensity from 1.5 to 1.0 for every biome entry. Do NOT change the pulse value (keep it at 0.15), do NOT modify any other material properties, and do NOT touch any geometry logic or structure.
